<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables firing from a vehicle cargo position. To get the turret path use [[assignedVehicleRole]] or [[getCargoIndex]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''enablePersonTurret''' [turretPath, enable] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [turretPath, enable]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>heli [[enablePersonTurret]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1],[[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[allTurrets]], [[moveInTurret]], [[turretUnit]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[getCargoIndex]], [[moveInCargo]], [[assignAsCargoIndex]], [[emptyPositions]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
